    • Constructor Detail

      • PurchaseFacade

        public PurchaseFacade(PurchaseDAO purchaseDAO,
                      OfferDAO offerDAO,
                      EmployeeDAO employeeDAO)
        Creates a new PurchaseFacade.
        Parameters:
        purchaseDAO - The purchase dao to use to access the purchases in the application.
        offerDAO - The offer dao used to access the offers in the application.
        employeeDAO - The employee dao used to access the employees in the application.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public java.util.List<Purchase> get(Constraint<PurchaseColumn>... constraints)
        Returns the purchases in the data storage. The results can be constrained using the provided constraints.
        Parameters:
        constraints - The constraints that modify the resulting list.
        Returns:
        The resulting purchases.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - When a data storage exception occurs while performing the operation.

      • first

        public Purchase first(Constraint<PurchaseColumn>... constraints)
        Returns the first purchase matching the provided constraints.
        Parameters:
        constraints - The constraints that modify the resulting list.
        Returns:
        The first purchase matching the provided constraints. Returns null when no constraints matches the provided constraints.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - When a data storage exception occurs while performing the operation.

      • create

        public Purchase create(int offerId,
                       int employeeId)
                throws InactiveCustomerException,
                       InsufficientPermissionsException
        Creates a new purchase from the offer with the provided id.
        Parameters:
        offerId - The id of the offer from which to create the purchase.
        employeeId - The id of the employee creating the purchase.
        Returns:
        An entity representing the new purchase.
        Throws:
        InactiveCustomerException - When the customer that the offer was issued to is inactive, and can therefor not create purchases.
        InsufficientPermissionsException - When the employee attempting to create the purchase, is not a member of role Role.SALESMAN.

      • size

        public int size()
         throws ApplicationException
        Returns the number of purchases in the data storage.
        Returns:
        The number of purchases in the data storage.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - When a data storage exception occurs while performing the operation.
